verses.verse: Therefore <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1223>seeing<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministry<s%>, even <S%G2531>as<s%> we obtained <S%G1653>mercy<s%>, we <S%G1573>faint<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> we have <S%G550>renounced<s%> the hidden <S%G2927>things<s%> of <S%G152>shame<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3834>craftiness<s%>, <S%G3366>nor<s%> <S%G1389>handling<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1389>deceitfully<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> by the <S%G5321>manifestation<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G4921>commending<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>'s <S%G4893>conscience<s%> in the sight <S%G1799>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Seeing <S%G3754><s%> it is <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G5457>Light<s%> shall <S%G2989>shine<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%>, who <S%G2989>shined<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>, <S%G4314>to<s%> give the <S%G5462>light<s%> of the <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

always <S%G3842><s%> bearing <S%G4064>about<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> the <S%G3500>dying<s%> <S%G2962>of<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> may be <S%G5319>manifested<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%>.

But <S%G2249><s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>, according to <S%G2596>that<s%> which is <S%G1125>written<s%>, I <S%G4100>believed<s%>, and <S%G1352>therefore<s%> did I <S%G2980>speak<s%>; <S%G4100>we<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1352>therefore<s%> also we <S%G2980>speak<s%>;

knowing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G3588>that<s%> raised <S%G1453>up<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> shall raise <S%G1453>up<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G3936>present<s%> us <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1223>for<s%> your <S%G5209>sakes<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%>, being <S%G4121>multiplied<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4119>many<s%>, <S%G4052>may<s%> cause the <S%G2169>thanksgiving<s%> to <S%G4052>abound<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1645>light<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%>, which is for the <S%G3910>moment<s%>, <S%G2716>worketh<s%> for us2254, 2596 more <S%G5236>and<s%> <S%G1519>more<s%> <S%G5236>exceedingly<s%> an <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G922>weight<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%>;
